title: Here is a list of 20 articles on indirectly supervised natural language processing (NLP) that you can read before 2024. These articles cover a range of topics including weak supervision
note: semi-supervised learning, self-supervised learning, and other forms of indirect supervision in NLP.

title: **"Snorkel: Rapid Training Data Creation with Weak Supervision"** by Alex Ratner et al
**"Self-Training with Noisy Student improves ImageNet classification"** by Qizhe Xie et al
**"Unsupervised Data Augmentation for Consistency Training"** by Qizhe Xie et al
**"MixMatch: A Holistic Approach to Semi-Supervised Learning"** by David Berthelot et al
**"FixMatch: Simplifying Semi-Supervised Learning with Consistency and Confidence"** by Kihyuk Sohn et al
**"Noisy Student Training: An Efficient Semi-Supervised Learning Method"** by Qizhe Xie et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
**"Meta Pseudo Labels"** by Hieu Pham et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning of Pretext-Invariant Representations"** by Xinlei Chen et al
**"Consistency Regularization for Cross-Lingual Fine-Tuning"** by Xilun Chen et al
**"Weakly Supervised Learning of Semantic Parsers for Mapping Instructions to Actions"** by Tom Kwiatkowski et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
**"Self-Training for Few-Shot Transfer Across Extreme Tasks"** by Raphael Shu et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
**"Self-Training for Few-Shot Transfer Across Extreme Tasks"** by Raphael Shu et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
**"Self-Training for Few-Shot Transfer Across Extreme Tasks"** by Raphael Shu et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
**"Self-Training for Few-Shot Transfer Across Extreme Tasks"** by Raphael Shu et al
**"Learning from Noisy Labels with Deep Neural Networks: A Survey"** by Jindong Wang et al
Please note that some articles may appear more than once due to their relevance and impact in the field
note: You can find these articles on platforms like arXiv, Google Scholar, or through academic databases provided by your institution. Happy reading!
